allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Privacy Proxy - Browser Anonymization Tool v1.0.0

Complete implementation of browser privacy proxy with:
- Browser fingerprint randomization (User-Agent, headers, etc.)
- Comprehensive cookie blocking (bidirectional, dev/null behavior)
- Automatic tracker domain/IP blocking with SQLite database
- Pattern-based and adaptive blocking mechanisms
- Management CLI for stats, blocklist export, whitelisting
- Detailed technical architecture documentation with Mermaid diagrams

Core Components:
- privacy_proxy.py: Main mitmproxy addon
- fingerprint_randomizer.py: Fingerprint rotation engine
- cookie_interceptor.py: Cookie blocking and logging
- traffic_blocker.py: Domain/IP blocking system
- database_handler.py: Thread-safe SQLite operations
- manage.py: Management CLI interface
- start_proxy.py: Launcher script

Features:
- 4 rotation modes: every_request, interval, new_tab, launch
- SQLite database tracking all cookie attempts and requests
- Auto-blocking after configurable hit threshold
- Whitelist support for trusted domains
- Blocklist export in multiple formats (hosts, text, JSON)
- Comprehensive logging and statistics

Documentation:
- README.md: Complete user documentation
- QUICKSTART.md: 5-minute setup guide
- ARCHITECTURE.md: Technical architecture with 15+ diagrams
- development_diary.md: Development log
- Inline code documentation with proper headers

Version: 1.0.0
License: MIT (with ethical use disclaimer)
Agent: AGENT-PRIME-001 (Claude Sonnet 4.5)

ðŸ¤– Generated with Claude Code
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add Interactive TUI Setup System + GitHub Gist

New Features:
- Interactive TUI setup wizard (setup_tui.py) using rich library
- Beautiful terminal UI with progress bars, tables, and panels
- 7-step guided installation process
- Privacy level presets (Maximum/Balanced/Minimal/Custom)
- Automatic prerequisite checking
- Virtual environment creation
- Dependency installation
- Directory setup
- Configuration generation
- Database initialization
- Installation verification

Documentation Updates:
- Updated README.md with TUI setup option (now recommended method)
- Updated QUICKSTART.md with TUI instructions
- Added GIST_CONTENT.md (comprehensive forum post content)

Dependencies:
- Added rich>=13.7.0 to requirements.txt for TUI support

Setup Wizard Features:
- Checks Python version, pip/uv, git
- Creates .venv automatically
- Installs all dependencies with progress indicator
- Interactive privacy configuration with 4 preset levels
- Generates config.yaml based on user preferences
- Initializes SQLite database
- Verifies all components
- Shows next steps with platform-specific commands

Privacy Level Presets:
1. Maximum Privacy (Paranoid) - every_request rotation, block all
2. Balanced Privacy (Recommended) - interval rotation, moderate blocking
3. Minimal Privacy (Testing) - launch rotation, logging only
4. Custom Configuration - manual settings

The TUI makes setup trivial - just run: python setup_tui.py

ðŸ¤– Generated with Claude Code

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
